error.cannot_connect: There was an error connecting to the service. Please try again later or if the problem presists log an issue on https://github.com/home-assistant/core/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22integration%3A+miraie_ac%22
error.invalid_auth: Invalid Mobile Number or Password. Please try again.
error.invalid_mobile: Invalid Mobile Number. Please use the format +91XXXXXXXXXX
error.mobile_not_registered: The Mobile Number has not been registered. Please complete the registration on the MirAIe mobile app and try again.
error.unknown: There was an unexpected error, please try again later or if the problem presists log an issue on https://github.com/home-assistant/core/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22integration%3A+miraie_ac%22
